product_name: Mission Athletecare EnduraCool Instant Cooling Towel - Large - Green
long_description: Made from a proprietary performance fabric that quickly cools when wet, the large Mission EnduraCool(TM) Instant Cooling towel helps regulate your body temperature after hard-charging activities. Simply soak the towel with water, wring it out, and snap it to activate the cooling properties. When wet, the towel cools to approximately 30 degrees lower than the average body temperature, and remains cool for two hours; when dry, the towel absorbs sweat. Machine washable.
short_description: Made from a proprietary performance fabric that quickly cools when wet, the large Mission EnduraCool(TM) Instant Cooling towel helps regulate your body temperature after hard-charging activities.
